feels.name: Trust
feels.quote: No, I had father and mother to help me, the dear babies to comfort me, and the thought that you and Amy were safe and happy, to make the troubles here easier to bear.

causedBy.name: Having family support and knowing loved ones are safe

hasObject.name: Father and mother, dear babies, and safe and happy loved ones

feels.name: Surprise
feels.quote: You are the same Jo still, dropping tears about one minute, and laughing the next. You look a little wicked now; what is it, grandma?

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: You always were a comfort, Teddy;

feels.name: Acceptance
feels.quote: If I shouldn't be in the way, it would be very pleasant. I begin to feel quite young already; for, somehow, all my troubles seemed to fly away when you came.

feels.name: Love
feels.quote: You are the same Jo still, dropping tears about one minute, and laughing the next. You look a little wicked now; what is it, grandma?

Places.name: Home
Places.description: Jo's residence where the emotional interactions take place.

Events.name: Having family support and knowing loved ones are safe
